channel.title: community on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in community on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - January 2024
item.description: The project’s live update was held the first time in 2024 and streamed live on January 17th, 2024. PrestaShop Live Update - January 2024 The first Live Update in 2024 was a chance to show the community yet another presentation from PrestaShop Developer Conference, present new patch versions, and answer some questions about the project organization, branding, and the future. For those who are interested in slides from Łukasz Janik’s presentation, he will write a blog post about it soon.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update January 2024
item.description: The first Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, January 17th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! In the first Live Update of the year, we have some news to share, and we will have a special guest. Łukasz Janik from the e-commerce agency Waynet will join us to talk about CI/CD processes for PrestaShop, they use in their projects. This presentation was originally presented during the PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris.

item.title: PSDevCon 2023: PrestaShop News - Where We Are And Where We’re Going
item.description: The PrestaShop Developer Conference happened on the 30th of November 2023. During the day, I was able to present a conference, titled “PrestaShop news - Where we are and where we’re going”. This blog post is a written version of the presentation that I also partially presented at the December Live Update on December 20th. This post does not cover the first part of the presentation titled “PrestaShop 8.1 & 2023 - What’s new” because PrestaShop 8.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - December 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the tenth time this year and streamed live on December 20th, 2023. PrestaShop Live Update - December 2023 The first Live Update after a month-long break, due to the PrestaShop Developer Conference, was the occasion for an important announcement, which probably comes as no surprise now that you’re reading this blog. The project now has the same branding PrestaShop SA has been using for several months.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris: Synopsis Of The Day
item.description: The European community of PrestaShop developers gathered to talk code, commerce and also open source in Paris, on November 30, 2023, at the PrestaShop Developer Conference. It was so exciting to see approximately 150 people come to follow conferences and other technical presentations, as well as network during the day. PrestaShop Developer Conference 2023 The event opened its doors at 9AM and very quickly the venue filled up. Attendees were able to enjoy breakfast before diving into the day’s introduction in the main room.

item.title: New Branding For The Project
item.description: This week will see some changes with the Project. PrestaShop SA, the company, is making the open source Project consistent with the new PrestaShop branding. New PrestaShop Project branding Unveiled earlier this year, PrestaShop launched its new brand identity to affirm PrestaShop’s strengths, showing more credibility and trust. Therefore, in the next few days, to align with this new identity, all materials related to the Project will change. You’ll see the rebranded Project’s website, developer documentation, this blog, and other Project-related content.

item.title: Announcing December PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The tenth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, December 20th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! This time, we will announce project updates and follow two presentations originally given at the PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris: PrestaShop news - where we are and where we’re going by @matks API OAuth/CQRS in PrestaShop 9 by @jolelievre Join us on YouTube! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris: Program and Registration
item.description: If you’re a PrestaShop developer or enthusiast looking to broaden your knowledge and connect with fellow community members, the PrestaShop Developer Conference is the event for you. Scheduled for November 30, 2023, in Paris, France, the conference promises an in-depth exploration of technical topics, innovative solutions, and ample opportunities to network and engage with peers who share your passion for PrestaShop. We’re also very happy to go over the recent unveiling of the agenda, packed with compelling sessions and engaging activities.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - October 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the ninth time this year and streamed live on October 11th, 2023. PrestaShop Live Update - October 2023 It was a special Live Update where we said goodbye to the project leader, Pablo Borowicz, who, after over six years, is leaving the PrestaShop company. On behalf of everyone in the project, I would like to thank him for all the work he has done for the project and wish him all the best in his future endeavors.

item.title: Announcing October PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The ninth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, October 11th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation and at the end of the session we will make a very special announcement. Join us on YouTube! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session.

item.title: Hacktoberfest 2023
item.description: The month of October is coming quickly! So be prepared for Hacktoberfest, a month-long celebration of open source software. Hacktoberfest 2023 The online event has been happening every October since 2013 and is sponsored by DigitalOcean. This year marks the 10th anniversary of the event, with changes to help ensure its sustainability for the next decade. You’ll learn about these right below. How can you participate? Very simple: people are encouraged to create at least 4 pull requests for open source projects on GitHub.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - September 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the eighth time this year and streamed live on September 13th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:30 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:28 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1.1, 8.0.5 and 1.7.8.10 08:56 Demo: changes in the developer documentation by @thomasnares 43:00 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: Announcing September PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The eighth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, September 13th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation, and more! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand. If you have questions related to the open source project, feel free to let us know in advance using this form.

item.title: The PrestaShop Developer Conference is coming to Paris!
item.description: Are you a passionate PrestaShop developer or enthusiast, wanting to expand your knowledge and network within the community? The PrestaShop team is happy to let you know the call for presentations is open for the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place in Paris, France on November 30, 2023. This event promises to be an opportunity to engage in technical discussions, discover solutions, and connect with like-minded peers in the community. So, what is the PrestaShop Developer Conference?

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - July 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the seventh time this year and streamed live on July 19th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 01:51 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:37 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1 14:39 Demo: enable WebP or Avif in PrestaShop 8.1 20:21 Demo: enable developer mode with cookie in PrestaShop 9.0 24:14 Demo: RectorPHP in PrestaShop 9.0 29:06 Demo: changes in the developer documentation 38:52 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.
